description: All values associated with a claim are stored in the Claim External Value record. The CLM_VALUES_3 table holds claim level values set by the system during claims processing or by user edits.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim values record.

columns.name: ASST_SURG_NAM_SUF
columns.description: The suffix to the assistant dental surgeon's name.

columns.name: ASST_SURG_NPI
columns.description: The assistant dental surgeon's National Provider Identifier (NPI).

columns.name: ASST_SURG_TAXONOMY
columns.description: The assistant dental surgeon's taxonomy code.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_NAM
columns.description: The name of the external location where the services were performed.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_NPI
columns.description: The NPI of the external location where the services were performed.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_CNCT_NAM
columns.description: The contact name for the external location.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_CNCT_PH
columns.description: The contact phone number for the external location.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_CNCT_EXT
columns.description: The contact phone extension for the external location.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the external location street address.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the external location street address.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_CITY
columns.description: The external location's city.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_STATE
columns.description: The external location's state.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_ZIP
columns.description: The external location's ZIP code.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_CNTRY
columns.description: The external location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: SVC_FAC_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: The external location's country subdivision (state, province, etc). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: PICK_UP_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the ambulance pick-up location street address.

columns.name: PICK_UP_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the ambulance pick-up location street address.

columns.name: PICK_UP_CITY
columns.description: The ambulance pick-up location's city.

columns.name: PICK_UP_STATE
columns.description: The ambulance pick-up location's state.

columns.name: PICK_UP_ZIP
columns.description: The ambulance pick-up location's ZIP code.

columns.name: PICK_UP_CNTRY
columns.description: The ambulance pick-up location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: PICK_UP_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: The ambulance pick-up location's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_NAM
columns.description: The name of the ambulance drop-off location.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_ADDR_1
columns.description: The first line of the ambulance drop-off location street address.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_ADDR_2
columns.description: The second line of the ambulance drop-off location street address.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_CITY
columns.description: The ambulance drop-off location's city.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_STATE
columns.description: The ambulance drop-off location's state.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_ZIP
columns.description: The ambulance drop-off location's ZIP code.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_CNTRY
columns.description: The ambulance drop-off location's country. It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: DROP_OFF_CNTRY_SUB
columns.description: The ambulance drop-off location's country subdivision (e.g., state, province). It is only populated if the address is outside the United States.

columns.name: CREATE_DT
columns.description: The date the claim was created. It is used for paper institutional claims.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_AMT_PAID
columns.description: The amount already paid by the payer of the current coverage.

columns.name: PAT_PROP_CAS_ID_TYP
columns.description: The qualifier for the Property and Casualty Patient ID used on American National Standards Institute (ANSI) version 5010 claims.

columns.name: PAT_PROP_CAS_ID
columns.description: This column stores the patient identifier for property and casualty claims used on American National Standards Institute (ANSI) version 5010 claims.

columns.name: ADMSN_QUAL
columns.description: The qualifier to identify when the admission hour is reported along with the admission date.

columns.name: REMARK
columns.description: The claim remark printed on institutional claims as the billing note.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_AMT_DUE
columns.description: The amount due by the payer of the current coverage.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_COMPLMT_ID
columns.description: The complementary payer ID for the payer of the current coverage.

columns.name: CLM_CVG_REL_INFO_DT
columns.description: The date on which the insured authorized the release of information to the payer.

columns.name: LOCAL_USE_CMS
columns.description: The value to print in Reserved for Local Use Box 10d on the paper 1500 version 08/05 Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) claim form. On the 1500 version 02/12 form, this field was removed and no longer used.

columns.name: DISABILITY_QUAL
columns.description: The qualifier for the disability date and time.

columns.name: DISABILITY_TM_QUAL
columns.description: The disability time format qualifier.

columns.name: CAS_SRC_CEV_ID
columns.description: The source claim values record to which this reason code claim values record is attached.

columns.name: CAS_LVL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The indicator that the claim values record includes claim-level or line-level explanation of benefits data.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Claim Level


Service Line Level


Reusable

columns.name: CAS_CVG_LN_NUM
columns.description: The coverage line number in the source claim values record for claim-level explanation of benefits.

columns.name: CAS_SVC_LN_NUM
columns.description: The service line number in the source claim values record.

columns.name: NCPDP_RECORD_TYPE
columns.description: The National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP) transaction type being submitted.

columns.name: TXST_TRANSMISSION_ACTION
columns.description: The indicator that the file being loaded is a replacement file, update file, or delete file.

columns.name: TXST_SUBMISSION_NUMBER
columns.description: The number of times data set has been re-sent.
